document_data.mainbody:
Karim Ben Aziz was a half-elf living on Masud Jazayir in the Crowded Sea in 1367 DR.
Karim served as the captain of the marketplace guards in Bandar al-Saadat. All of the guardsmen serving under him were also close family members.
Karim was the younger brother of Mahmud Ben Aziz.
